moves.3. e3 e5: Not enough. Loses a pawn. Better is Nc6.
moves.4. fxe5 fxe5 5. dxe5 Nc6 6. Bb5 Bd7 7. Q: Waste of a good tempo? Better is Qxd5.
moves.10. a4: S/he thinks the Bishop is safe!
moves.17... Qd1+ 18. Kf2 Qe2+ 19. Kg3: Dancing 'round the e-pawn, and into the jaws of the unavoidable Mate Trap.
Thank you for annotating! Please R&C!
